title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
### Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch

#### Product Overview
Discover the ultimate outdoor companion with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. Designed for the adventurous spirit, this powerful watch combines advanced features, solar charging capabilities, and superior performance to keep you informed and prepared in any outdoor activity. Whether you're surfing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, or just exploring the great outdoors, this watch is your perfect partner.

#### Key Features

- **Charging Capabilities**: Harness the power of the sun with solar charging, ensuring you can use the watch indefinitely with just 3 hours of sunlight per day (50,000 lux).
- **Battery Life**:
  - **Smartwatch Mode**: Unlimited battery life with solar charging.
  - **GPS Mode**: Up to 48 hours of continuous use with solar charging (50,000 lux).

#### Surfing Features
- **Wave Counter**: Keep track of your wave counts and improve your surfing skills.
- **Maximum Speed Tracking**: Monitor your maximum speeds for each session.
- **Distance Tracking**: Measure the distance you've traveled.
- **Tide Data**: Stay informed about tide conditions for better performance.

#### Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Features
- **GPS Position**: Stay aware of your current location.
- **Speed Measurement**: Measure and track your speed accurately.
- **Distance Measurement**: Keep track of the distance you've sailed.
- **Heart Rate Monitoring**: Monitor your heart rate for optimal performance.
- **Elevation Data for Jumps**: Track your jumps and aerials with precision.

#### Compatibility
- **Surfline Sessions**: Access real-time surf conditions and forecasts.
- **Smart Notifications**: Stay connected with emails, texts, and social media updates.
- **Connect IQ**: Utilize the Connect IQ platform for custom watch faces and apps.
- **Garmin Pay**: Not applicable for this model.

#### Preloaded Activity Profiles
- **Running**
- **Biking**
- **Swimming**
- **Strength Training**

#### Navigation
- **3-Axis Compass**: Always know your direction.
- **Barometric Altimeter**: Track your elevation accurately.
- **Satellite Systems**: Utilize GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo for precise location tracking.

#### Health Monitoring
- **Heart Rate**: Monitor your heart rate during workouts.
- **Sleep Tracking**: Track your sleep quality and duration.
- **Pulse Ox**: Limited availability for Pulse Ox monitoring (check device settings).
- **Respiration Tracking**: Monitor your breathing during workouts.
- **Stress Tracking**: Keep track of your stress levels.

#### Physical Specifications
- **Water Rating**: Rated up to 100 meters, perfect for swimming and snorkeling.
- **Thermal Resistance**: Withstands extreme temperatures.
- **Shock Resistance**: Built to withstand impacts and drops.
- **Case Material**: Fiber-reinforced polymer for durability.
- **Glass Type**: Scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass for durability.

#### Size
- **45 MM**

#### Additional Features
- **Garmin Pay**: Not included in this model.

### Why Choose the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition?

- **Reliability**: Built for the toughest outdoor conditions.
- **Versatility**: Ideal for a wide range of activities from surfing to hiking.
- **Sun-Powered**: Enjoy endless use with solar charging.
- **Advanced Features**: Track your performance, stay connected, and monitor your health.

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch is your ultimate partner for any outdoor adventure. Experience the freedom of the outdoors with this powerful and reliable watch.
